title: DropData
description: An inventory item (not to be confused with vanilla items) that can be picked up and interacted with via the ship's inventory menu.

id.description: A unique internal identifier for this entity. This must not be the same as any other entity of the same type in your mod.

name.description: The name to display in-game for this entity.

description.description: A short description to display in the inventory for this drop.

rarity.description: The 'quality' rating of this drop, which generally reflects its value.

equipSlot.description: Which equipment slot this drop can be equipped to, if any. Mutually exclusive with consumable.

consumable.description: Whether this item can be consumed, removing it from the player's inventory. Mutually exclusive with equipSlot.

duration.description: How long the effects of this drop's buffs will last after being consumed, in seconds.

iconPath.description: A file path (relative to your mod's folder) to an image file to use for this drop's icon. Can be shared with other drops.

pickUpAudioType.description: An Outer Wilds AudioType value that will be played when the drop is picked up. See https://nh.outerwildsmods.com/reference/audio_enum.html

consumeAudioType.description: An Outer Wilds AudioType value that will be played when the drop is consumed. See https://nh.outerwildsmods.com/reference/audio_enum.html

buffs.description: Effects that will apply while this drop is equipped.

locations.description: Locations in the solar system to place pickups for this drop.

BuffData.description: Various possible effects that will apply when the buff is active.

custom.description: Defines a custom effect that can be interacted with via the mod API.

fogDensity.description: Modifies the density of planetary fog to increase or decrease visibility.

giveDrop.description: Adds a drop directly to the player's inventory.

hazardDamage.description: Modifies the damage the player takes from various types of hazards.

heal.description: Restores a percentage of the player's health.

holdBreath.description: Modifies the duration that a player can survive with no oxygen before suffocating or drowning.

inventorySpace.description: Increases the capacity of the player's inventory.

maxHealth.description: Modifies the maximum health of the player.

translationSpeed.description: Modifies the speed at which the player can translate Nomai text.

travelMusic.description: Changes the travel music played when flying the ship between planets.

CustomEffectData.description: Defines a custom effect that can be interacted with via the mod API.

id.description: A custom value that uniquely identifies this effect. Also used as the description's translation key.

description.description: The text to display in the UI for this effect.

FogDensityEffectData.description: Modifies the density of planetary fog to increase or decrease visibility.

multiply.description: The percentage to multiply the total fog density by. E.g. a value of 0.25 will result in 25% fog density, or a 75% reduction.

GiveDropEffectData.description: Adds a drop directly to the player's inventory.

drop.description: The unique ID of the drop to give.

amount.description: The number of copies to give.

HazardDamageEffectData.description: Modifies the damage the player takes from various types of hazards.

type.description: The type of hazard to modify damage for.

add.description: The percentage of the initial damage to add/reduce. E.g. a value of -0.1 means subtract 10% of the base damage from the total.

multiply.description: The percentage to multiply the total damage by. E.g. a value of 0.25 will result in 25% damage, or a 75% reduction.

HealEffectData.description: Restores a percentage of the player's health.

amount.description: The percentage of total health to restore. E.g. 0.2 will restore 20% of maximum health.

HoldBreathEffectData.description: Modifies the duration that a player can survive with no oxygen before suffocating or drowning.

seconds.description: The number of seconds to add or remove from the total suffocation duration. E.g. a value of 0.5 will result in suffocating taking half a second longer.

InventorySpaceEffectData.description: Increases the capacity of the player's inventory.

amount.description: The number of inventory spaces to add.

multiply.description: The percentage to multiply the total jump speed by. E.g. a value of 0.25 will result in 25% jump speed, or a 75% reduction.

MaxHealthEffectData.description: Modifies the maximum health of the player.

add.description: The percentage of the base health to add/reduce. E.g. a value of -0.1 means subtract 10% of the base health from the total.

multiply.description: The percentage to multiply the total max health by. E.g. a value of 0.25 will result in 25% of base max health, or a 75% reduction.
The percentage to multiply the total movement speed by. E.g. a value of 0.25 will result in 25% movement speed, or a 75% reduction.

TranslationSpeedEffectData.description: Modifies the speed at which the player can translate Nomai text.

multiply.description: The percentage to multiply the total translation time by. E.g. a value of 0.25 will result in translating taking 25% of the usual time, or a 75% reduction.

TravelMusicEffectData.description: Changes the travel music played when flying the ship between planets.

audioType.description: An Outer Wilds AudioType value that will be used as the travel music will this buff is active. See https://nh.outerwildsmods.com/reference/audio_enum.html

DropLocationData.description: A location in the solar system where this drop can be picked up by the player.

parentPath.description: The full path to a GameObject in the solar system that the prop should be attached to.

position.description: The position to place the prop at.

isRelativeToParent.description: Whether the position and rotation are relative to the parent, instead of the whole planet.

alignRadial.description: Whether to orient the prop to point 'up' away from the center of the planet, or use the provided rotation value. Defaults to true if `rotation` is omitted and false otherwise.

respawns.description: Whether this drop respawns at the start of every loop.

visuals.description: Full paths to GameObjects to disable when picking up this drop.
